Name: Acid Burst
Description: When this character takes damage, all adjacent foes take 1 piercing damage. Increase this damage to 2 piercing against poisoned characters. This effect can trigger any number of times a round.

Name: Acid Splash
Description: Attacks deal 1 piercing damage on hit or miss to all foes in range 2 of the target as an area effect.

Actions.Name: Acrobatics
Actions.Description: Dash 2. This action can interrupt and split up other actions or movement.

Name: Aerial Acrobat
Description: If an attack misses this character, they may deal 2 damage to the attacker, then fly 2.

Name: Aetherskin
Description: When bloodied, becomes intangible until the end of its next turn.

Name: Aetherwall
Description: Gains automatic cover against all attacks that originate outside of range 2 from them. (Cover grants resistance against ranged attacks, reducing it by 1/2)

Name: Amorphous
Description: Can share space with other characters. Any characters that start their turn inside its space take [fray] damage.

Name: Armor [X]
Description: Reduce all damage taken by [X].

Name: Aura of Bloodlust
Description: Aura 1. Foes that end their turn in the Aura must save or gain hatred of this character.

Name: Aura of Rot
Description: Aura 2. Foes that start or end their turn in the aura lose all vigor, then take 2 piercing damage.

Name: Aura of Freedom
Description: Aura 1. This character and allies in the aura are immune to terrain effects, pits, difficult, and dangerous terrain.

Name: Aura of Resilience
Description: Aura 2. Self and allies in the aura gain +1 boon on saves and are immune to critical hits. (downgrade critical hits to regular hits)

Name: Aura of Shielding
Description: Aura 1. This character and allies in the aura have dodge. (Immune to damage from missed attacks, area effects, and successful saves)

Name: Aura of Terror
Description: Aura 1. Foes that end their turn in the aura must save or become pacified and shoved 1.

Name: Automata
Description: This character always attempts to attack and focus on the closest foe at the start of its turn.

Name: Battle Platform
Description: Characters can mount or dismount this character with their standard move, placing them adjacent when dismounting. Allies can start the battle mounted on this character. While mounted, place them inside a free space in this character (size 2 characters has space for 4 size 1 characters, while size 3 characters has space for 9). They share its space, move when it moves, and have cover. Characters hostile to this character must pass a save to mount it. Characters mounting it when it is defeated are placed adjacent and stunned.

Name: Beyond Death
Description: When defiance activates, roll a d6. On a 4+, this character immediately regains defiance. Attacks with True Strike bypass this trait.

Name: Blood Rush
Description: On Critical Hit or Slay, gains +1 action.

Name: Blood Scent
Description: Always focuses on the closest bloody foe.

Name: Bloodwhetter
Description: When this character is damaged by an ability they may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe. This happens each time this character is damaged.

Name: Boiling Shroud
Description: While bloodied, has aura 1. All characters in the aura have permanent stealth and are blinded+, but only while inside the aura.

Name: Brace
Description: When adjacent to terrain height 1 or higher, increase the range of all abilities with a listed range by +4, and attacks ignore cover.

Name: Bullheaded
Description: Has resistance unless suffering from a status.

Name: Camouflage
Description: If this character ends its turn adjacent to an object or or inside difficult terrain, it gains stealth.

Name: Cheap Trick
Description: When missed by an attack, may deal 1 damage to their attacker, then teleport 1.

Name: Collect Paycheck
Description: All actions have Slay: Gain +1 action.

Name: Command Aura
Description: Aura 2. Allies in the aura have +1 boon on attacks.

Name: Cowerdly by Nature
Description: This character surrenders and ends the fight if it's the only character left.

Name: Counter
Description: Each time a foe deals damage to you with an ability, deal 2 damage back.

Name: Cronies
Description: This character starts combat with 5 mob allies, regardless of encounter budget.

Name: Crystal Dagger
Description: When this character teleports, it may deal 1 damage to a foe in range 3.

Name: Curse the Eyeless
Description: Evasion against blinded or slowed characters. (Roll a d6 when targeted by an attack. On a 4+, the attack automatically misses. Check before the attack roll)

Name: Death Whistle
Description: When this character attacks, other characters in range 2 of it must save or lose any stances they are holding.

Name: Defiance
Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect and character becomes immune to all damage for the rest of the current turn.

Name: Dig
Description: Can phase through terrain and characters.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can end a status or blight. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Name: Distortion
Description: Aura 1. Foes inside are blinded+.

Name: Dirty Fighting
Description: +1 boon on attacks and bonus damage to characters inside pits.

Name: Divine Presence
Description: Immune to stun.

Name: Dodge
Description: Immune to damage from missed attacks, area effects, and successful saves.

Name: Duty of Death
Description: Adjacent allies to this character without this trait have dodge.

Name: Dweller in Dark
Description:
This character has the following abilities:
- Immune to pits.
- Immune to blinded.
- May use its standard move to teleport from the area of any pit to any other pit.
- Has resistance while inside a pit.

Name: Earthbreaker
Description: This character can phase through objects and destroys any objects it moves through this way. Objects that can't normally be destroyed are instead removed as if they were unsummoned.

Name: Elite
Description: Takes 2 turns.

Name: Enrage
Description: While bloody, gain +1 action.

Name: Entrench
Description: Unstoppable while inside a pit.

Name: Equivalent Exchange
Description: Aura 1. Once a round, when an ally in the Aura is defeated, deal divine damage to any foe on the battlefield equal to 25% of their max hp.

Name: Eternal Rage
Description: When defeated, instead remain at 1 hp and become intangible until the end of their next turn. At the end of that turn, become defeated.

Name: Ethereal (Resistance)
Description: Phasing, and has resistance unless there's an adjacent foe.

Name: Ethereal (Evasion)
Description: Phasing, and has evasion unless there's an adjacent foe.

Name: Evasion
Description: Roll a d6 when targeted by an attack. On a 4+, the attack automatically misses. Check before the attack roll.

Name: Explosive Demise
Description: When defeated, explodes in a blast 1 area effect centered on it. Foes inside are shoved 1 away from the origin space and must save or take [D]+[fray], or [fray] on a successful save.

Name: Eyeless
Description: Immune to blinded.

Name: Flip Over
Description: When taking damage more than its armor total, loses all armor, becomes stunned, and all attacks against it are critical hits. These effects last until the end of its next turn.

Name: Flying
Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Name: Fortify
Description: At the end of their turn, gains vigilance 1.

Name: Frenzy
Description: When hitting with an attack, immediately gain +1 action.

Name: Great Enrage
Description: Sturdy and +1 action while bloodied. (Can't be stunned or dazed, and reduce the distance of all shoves by 1)

Name: Great Leap
Description: Ignores height movement penalties. When moving from a higher elevation to a lower one, may fly until the movement ends.

Name: Greenwalker
Description: Immune to difficult terrain.

Name: Grit
Description: Sturdy when bloodied. (Can't be stunned or dazed, and reduce the distance of all shoves by 1)

Name: Heavy Armor
Description: Resistant to abilities used from adjacent spaces.

Name: Heavy Metal Shield
Description: Has resistance against abilities from the closest foe. If multiple foes are equidistant, this trait applies to all of them.

Name: Hellforged
Description: Immune to difficult and dangerous terrain.

Name: Hold the Line [X]
Description: If this character ends any turn without attacking, they gain Sturdy until the start of their next turn and Vigilance [X]. (Can't be stunned or dazed, and reduce the distance of all shoves by 1)

Name: Hollow
Description: Aura 1. While there is exactly 1 other character in hollow's aura, it has have evasion and stealth. This aura has no effect if no other characters, or 2 or more other characters are inside, and its effects (including stealth) turn off it if deactivates.

Name: Immortal Disregard
Description: Attacks never miss this character.

Name: Immovable Object
Description: Unstoppable. (Immune to all statuses. Can't be immobilized, shoved, or teleported by foes)

Name: Insulated
Description: Immune to damage from terrain and terrain effects.

Name: Isolation
Description: Has resistance to damage dealt by characters with no allies adjacent.

Actions.Name: Juggernaut
Actions.Description: Clear a status, mark, or all blights affecting this character.

Name: Legend
Description: Takes 1 turn after every player character takes a turn. If slow, only one of its turns is affected.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can end a status or blight. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Actions.Name: Slip
Actions.Description: Remove self from the battlefield, then return in a free space in range 5.

Name: Legendary Vigilance
Description: Can use Vigilance twice a round.

Name: Living Lightning
Description: Electrifies foes it moves through. Foes that are already electrified must save or become slowed. Allied spaces cost 0 movement to pass through.

Name: Lone Wolf
Description: When ending their turn with no enemies or allies in range 2, gains stealth.

Name: Low Profile
Description: Has evasion against ranged attacks.

Name: Martyrdom
Description: When defeated, grants vigor 1 to all allies in range 2.

Name: Master of Strategy
Description: Before combat starts, may move every character to any space up to 2 spaces in any direction from their starting location.

Name: Mob
Description: This character doesn't trigger slay effects.

Name: Monster Riding
Description: This character starts combat riding a trained monster, and can also mount it as an action or by spending its standard move. While riding, the rider shares space with the monster and moves when it moves. If the two are separated, this effect ends until the monster is remounted.

Summons.Name: Tame Monster
Summons.Actions: During the rider's turn, can dash 4, then either shove a character 1 space or deal 2 damage to them.

Name: Nimble
Description: Has evasion unless suffering from a status.

Name: Noxious Censer
Description: The priest has Aura 2. Poisoned foes in the aura get +1 curse on attacks and saves.

Name: Open Rift
Description: Create a pit under any character hit by the wraith's attacks.

Name: Overdrive [X]
Description: All attacks after round [X] are critical hits on hit (+[D]).

Name: Pack Tactics
Description: Gains +1 boon on attacks if an ally is adjacent to their target.

Name: Pack Tactics (Improved)
Description: Gains +1 boon on attacks if an ally is adjacent to their target and bonus damage for every ally adjacent to their target.

Name: Painwrack
Description: Characters that collide with this character take [fray] damage.

Name: Partner Work
Description: Aura 2. When this character dashes, an ally in the aura may also dash 1.

Name: Phase Slip
Description: After being damaged for the first time on any turn, become intangible until the start of the following turn.

Name: Phasing
Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Name: Primal Strength
Description: This character's abilities have Collide: Character takes [fray] damage and is dazed.

Name: Ranged Master
Description: Ignores ranged attack penalties for adjacent foes.

Name: Regeneration
Description: Gain vigor 1 at the end of your turn.

Name: Regenerator
Description: Starts combat with vigor 1 and Regeneration. Starts combat bloodied. (Gain vigor 1 as the end of their turn).

Name: Rook
Description: Grants cover to adjacent allies.

Name: Roppo
Description: The first time on any turn a foe takes an action in range 2, the Yaman may dash 2, then deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Name: Saddle Up
Description: An adjacent ally can mount or dismount this character as a free action, entering and sharing its space. Whiled mounted, attacks take +1 curse against a rider. Allies can start any combat already riding this character. This character has room for two size 1 characters. If this character is defeated, characters dismount.

Name: Salty
Description: When this character deals self damage, they gain vigor 1 after taking the damage.

Name: Shambling
Description: Cannot dash.

Name: Shelter
Description: +1 boon on saves.

Name: Size [X]
Description: This character takes up a [X] by [X] area of spaces.

Name: Skirmish
Description: Can move diagonally, and dash moves full speed.

Name: Slam
Description: This character's abilities have Collide: Character is dazed. Dazed characters also take [D]+[fray].

Name: Slime Trail
Description: Aura 1. Any foe that starts their turn in the aura slips and is shoved 2. Collide: Foe takes [fray] damage.

Name: Slimy Skin
Description: When damaged, may dash 1 as an effect.

Actions.Name: Slip
Actions.Description: Remove self from the battlefield, then return within 1 space.

Name: Slippery
Description: While bloodied, has evasion.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description: Attacks from Stealth are critical hits (+[D]).

Name: Stench
Description: Melee attacks against this character have +1 curse. Characters starting their turns in an adjacent space are poisoned. Poisoned foes treat the area as dangerous terrain.

Name: Stoneskin
Description: Has resistance while adjacent to an object.

Name: Street Fighter
Description: Has resistance while adjacent to two or more foes.

Name: Strength
Description: This character's abilities have Collide: [fray] damage and foe is dazed. Dazed foes take [D]+[fray] instead.

Name: Sturdy
Description: Can't be stunned or dazed, and reduce the distance of all shoves by 1.

Name: Stutter
Description: Once a turn, after a foe takes an action in range 2, this character may teleport 1 and deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Name: Summon
Description: Natals disappear when reduced to 0 hp and don't cause engagement.

Name: Surreality
Description: Starts combat bloodied, but with vigor 1.

Name: Swarm
Description: Has resistance to any damage not from area effects or attacks. Does not provide obstruction, but characters treat its space as difficult terrain.

Name: Swarm Shroud
Description: Aura 2. Ranged attacks against this character and allies in the aura gain +1 curse, and foes that start their turn in the aura take 1 piercing damage.

Name: Terrain Expert
Description: Ignores movement, damage, and attack penalties from all kinds of terrain.

Name: Terrainwalking
Description: Ignores movement penalties for height and terrain.

Name: Terrainwalking
Description: Ignores movement penalties for height and terrain.

Name: The Old Blood
Description: Immune to blights.

Name: Time Lock
Description: After taking damage, this character becomes intangible until the start of the following turn.

Name: True Enrage
Description: Unstoppable and +1 action while bloodied.

Name: Tumbling
Description: Moving up terrain costs no movement. Can phase through characters and doing so costs 0 movement.

Name: Tunnel
Description: When this character ends its turn, create a pit underneath it.

Name: Two Heads
Description: Saves at the start and the end of its turn to end conditions or other effects.

Name: Unstable
Description: When defeated, explodes in a blast 1 explosion centered on this cgaracter. Characters inside take [D] piercing damage, twice, as an area effect. This character is then removed from the battlefield. Create a pit in the area it vacated.

Name: Unstoppable
Description: Immune to all statuses. Can't be immobilized, shoved, or teleported by foes.

Name: Unstable Reality
Description: 1/turn, teleports 1 when damaged by an ability.

Name: Vengeance
Description: When bloodied, next attack becomes a critical hit on hit (+[D]).

Name: Venom Blade
Description: Attacks inflict poisoned, ignore vigor, and deal bonus damage against bloodied characters.

Name: Wayfinding
Description: Immune to terrain effects and difficult terrain.

Name: Zipline Dismount
Description: Characters mounted on this character can fly 5 and dismount it as free action.
